attributes.review: My WiFi’s always been good but a few days after having the app it would always say poor connection. My phone also started to glitch not turning off when right when I pressed the button. My texting app got glitchy and I know it’s not because my storage my storage is fine. After deleting the app my phone stopped being crazy.
attributes.title: WiFi gone weird and phone

attributes.review:
There's 104 days of summer vacation

And school comes along just to end it

So the annual problem for our generation

Is finding a good way to spend it

Like maybe... building a rocket

Or fighting a mummy

Or climbing the Eiffel Tower 

Discovering something that doesn’t exist(hey!)

Or giving a monkey a shower

Surfing tidal waves

Creating nanobots

Or locating Frankenstein’s brain(It’s over here!)

Finding a dodo bird 

Painting a continent 

Or driving your sister insane(Phineas!)

As you can see

There’s a whole lot to do

Before school starts this fall(Come on Perry!)

So stick with us 'cause Phineas and Ferb

Are gonna do it all

So stick with us 'cause Phineas and Ferb are

Gonna do it all!

(Mom! Phineas and Ferb are making a title sequence! )
(Guitar downs)
attributes.title: Phineas and Ferb are better than trump❤️🦋🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: I don't usually write reviews, but this app is so bad that I had to say something. It took two days to download and I had to restart my phone. When I turned it back on I was HORRIFIED. All that was on my phone was a picture of donny boy in the NUDE. I had night terrors for three consecutive nights. Finally, I had a night with no panic dreams. But when I opened my eyes I was dead. I asked God what happened, he said I died from the trauma of seeing his orange wee.
attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED ME! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: So I have this condition where when I see something that makes me physically ill I punch myself in the face. When I downloaded this app I was sent to the hospital with the amount of times I hit myself. Trumps app made me physically hurt myself and sent me to the hospital with a black eye and a loose butthole. Do not download this app. In conclusion the president wants me to die and have a loose butthole while doing so when I previously had a very 𝓽𝓲ᧁꫝ𝓽 ℎ𝑜𝑙𝑒.
attributes.title: Mmm mm.... Ion liek det 🙈😗✌🏾(rip to my hole)

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be able to learn more about the one potential candidate and this app DESTROYED MY PHONE. my brand new iphone xr I just purchased last week was losing battery at a ridiculous rate. I know this app caused it because I was having great battery life the last few days with my other usual apps. the day I downloaded this app, my phone lost 25 percent battery in 10 minutes. it was terrible. I WOULD STRONGLY ADVISE YOU DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: As a lover of citrus, I downloaded this because of the orange on the front. I was quickly diss appointed in what the United States has come to and the hate people spread. BLM. DUMPTRUMP. Let’s get an administration that is generally tolerant of basic things, like people to start off with. They are trying to get rid of tiktok for what reason?? Because they are worried about what we can do. This terrible excuse for a human can go burn in hell.
attributes.title: Did not fulfill my needs, I want Obama back.

attributes.review: took two days to download, and when i opened it the app was blank! not anything in sight across the whole app! When it finally did load the information was very badly organized and written. ✨💘trash, but make it flaming✨🧚🏻‍♂️💞💅i really hope apple realizes what they’re allowing to be put on the appstore, it would be such a shame if it was taken off and no one could use it :(
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♂️absolutely awful✨💗

attributes.review: 🧚✨This app took TWO WEEKS to download and then I almost died when I opened it there was what I thought was a Cheeto crumb on my screen was actually the ✨pedo orange✨ I was trying to support! I mean geez it scared me to death like what was it made out of even my dogs were scared so bad they went and hid in a closet! So this app is truly TERRIFYING not to mention it played the peppa pig theme song over and over again! This app doesn’t deserve to be on the store. ✨🧚
attributes.title: Disappointing 😤😡

attributes.review: I definitely didn’t like how you couldn’t even get past the home screen of the app without signing up using your cellphone number. What do you need that for? Felt to me like a breach of privacy ~ there is no need for you to have my cellphone number. What are you trying to do? So much info is tied to cellphone numbers... easily something that could link to other information. Shame :/ :/ :/
attributes.title: Breach of privacy

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible I downloaded it  and once I opened the app it glitches and my phone screen went black. At first I thought it had died but that I pressed the power button and I turned back on however it went to the lock screen where it said hello swipe to setup your iPhone. This app erased my phone I lost years of pictures and memories I do not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Broke my phone
